languages.text: "Сюрприз, {mf|мерзкий ублюдок|мерзкая тварь}! Не ожидал{mf||а} такого поворота? Думал{mf||а}, можешь так просто сюда заявиться? Если ты там еще не подох{mf||ла} — ходи и оглядывайся, то ли еще будет!"

traits.locale_text: "Сюрприз, {mf|мерзкий ублюдок|мерзкая тварь}! Не ожидал{mf||а} такого поворота? Думал{mf||а}, можешь так просто сюда заявиться? Если ты там еще не подох{mf||ла} — ходи и оглядывайся, то ли еще будет!"

languages.text: "Surprise, you {mf|ugly bastard|vile wench}! Didn't expect this turn of events, did you? Thought you could just waltz in here? If you're not dead yet, watch your back from now on — this is just the beginning!"
languages.original_text: "Сюрприз, {mf|мерзкий ублюдок|мерзкая тварь}! Не ожидал{mf||а} такого поворота? Думал{mf||а}, можешь так просто сюда заявиться? Если ты там еще не подох{mf||ла} — ходи и оглядывайся, то ли еще будет!"

traits.locale_text: "Surprise, you {mf|ugly bastard|vile wench}! Did not expect such turn of events, did you? Thought you could just waddle in? Watch your back from now, this is just the beginning!"
"Surprise, you {mf|ugly bastard|wanton skank}! Did not expect such turn of events, did you? Thought you could just waddle in? Watch your back from now, this is just the beginning!"
"Surprise, you {mf|ugly bastard|vile wench}! Did not expect such turn of events, did you? Thought you could just waddle in? Watch your back from now, this is just the beginning!"
"Surprise, you {mf|ugly bastard|vile wench}! Did not expect such turn of events, did you? Thought you could just waddle in? Watch your back from now, this is just the beginning!"

"Surprise, you {mf|ugly bastard|vile wench}! Didn't expect this turn of events, did you? Thought you could just waltz in here? If you're not dead yet, watch your back from now on — this is just the beginning!"

"Surprise, you {mf|ugly bastard|vile wench}! Didn't expect this turn of events, did you? Thought you could just waltz in here? If you're not dead yet, watch your back from now on — this is just the beginning!"

languages.text: 「よう、{mf|ジジイ|ババア}！こうなるとは予想してなかったか？ここなら簡単にいけるとでも？くたばり損なってるなら、これから背後に気を付けるんだな…こんなのは、まだ序の口だ！」
languages.original_text: "Surprise, you {mf|ugly bastard|vile wench}! Didn't expect this turn of events, did you? Thought you could just waltz in here? If you're not dead yet, watch your back from now on — this is just the beginning!"

traits.locale_text: 「よう、{mf|ジジイ|ババア}！こうなるとは予想してなかったか？ここなら簡単にいけるとでも？くたばり損なってるなら、これから背後に気を付けるんだな…こんなのは、まだ序の口だ！」

languages.text: «¡Sorpresa, {mf|fantoche|fulana} de las narices! Esto no te lo esperabas, ¿eh? ¿Pensabas que ibas a poder entrar pavoneándote? Si sigues con vida, vigila tus espaldas, ¡porque acabamos de empezar!».
languages.original_text: "Surprise, you {mf|ugly bastard|vile wench}! Didn't expect this turn of events, did you? Thought you could just waltz in here? If you're not dead yet, watch your back from now on — this is just the beginning!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Sorpresa, {mf|fantoche|fulana} de las narices! Esto no te lo esperabas, ¿eh? ¿Pensabas que ibas a poder entrar pavoneándote? Pues vigila tus espaldas, ¡acabamos de empezar!».

languages.text: “惊不惊喜？{mf|臭混蛋|臭婊子}！没想到还有这招吧？你们居然就这么大摇大摆地走进来？如果你们还没断气，那最好当心点，因为游戏才刚刚开始呢！”
languages.original_text: "Surprise, you {mf|ugly bastard|vile wench}! Didn't expect this turn of events, did you? Thought you could just waltz in here? If you're not dead yet, watch your back from now on — this is just the beginning!"

traits.locale_text: “惊不惊喜？{mf|臭混蛋|臭婊子}！没想到还有这招吧？你们居然就这么大摇大摆地走进来？你们最好当心点了，游戏才刚刚开始呢！”

languages.text: « Surprise, sale {mf|bâtard|catin} ! T'avais pas prévu ça, hein ? Tu croyais que tu pouvais débarquer comme si de rien n'était ? Si t'es pas encore {mf|mort|morte}, surveille bien tes arrières, parce que c'est pas près d'être terminé ! »
languages.original_text: "Surprise, you {mf|ugly bastard|vile wench}! Didn't expect this turn of events, did you? Thought you could just waltz in here? If you're not dead yet, watch your back from now on — this is just the beginning!"

traits.locale_text: « Surprise, sale {mf|bâtard|catin} ! T'avais pas prévu ça, hein ? Tu croyais que tu pouvais te pointer l'air de rien ? Surveille tes arrières, parce que c'est pas près d'être terminé ! »

languages.text: "Überraschung, Ihr {mf|hässlicher Mistkerl|widerwärtiges Weib}! Mit dieser Wendung hattet Ihr nicht gerechnet, was? Dachtet Ihr, Ihr könnt hier einfach reinspazieren? Solltet Ihr noch nicht tot sein, nehmt Euch von nun an lieber in Acht ... denn das ist nur der Anfang!"
languages.original_text: "Surprise, you {mf|ugly bastard|vile wench}! Didn't expect this turn of events, did you? Thought you could just waltz in here? If you're not dead yet, watch your back from now on — this is just the beginning!"

traits.locale_text: "Überraschung, Ihr {mf|hässlicher Mistkerl|widerwärtiges Weib}! Mit dieser Wendung der Ereignisse hattet Ihr wohl nicht gerechnet, was? Dachtet Ihr, Ihr könntet einfach hereinspazieren? Seid von nun an lieber auf der Hut, das ist erst der Anfang!"

languages.text: "İşte böyle basılırsın {mf|adi puşt|leş karı}! Hayırdır, şok mu oldun? Kafama göre girerim, kimse de bir şey demez mi sandın? Gebermediysen hiç rahat nefes alma... Bu iş daha yeni başlıyor!"
languages.original_text: "Surprise, you {mf|ugly bastard|vile wench}! Didn't expect this turn of events, did you? Thought you could just waltz in here? If you're not dead yet, watch your back from now on — this is just the beginning!"
